amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by 10 percent general administrative and departmental salary and expense accounts in Division D, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 204 printed in House Report 115-297 to reduce by 10% general administrative and departmental salary and expense accounts in Division D, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A166) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 241 (Roll no. 524).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A166) offered by Mr. Mitchell.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A166) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 241 (Roll no. 524).
